Smart Soap Dispenser with Voice Control: Create a soap dispenser that can be controlled through voice commands. This smart soap dispenser can be integrated with smart home devices, allowing users to easily dispense soap with just a simple voice command. For example, "Hey, soap dispenser, dispense some soap."

Interactive Soap Dispenser with Games: Design a soap dispenser that can interact with users through games. For example, the dispenser could display a message like "Wash your hands to win a prize!" and dispense soap when the user successfully completes a mini-game. This would make hand-washing more fun and engaging for kids and adults alike.

Soap Dispenser with Personalized Messages: Create a soap dispenser that can display personalized messages on its screen. Users can upload their own messages or use pre-loaded ones, such as "Stay healthy" or "Love yourself." This would make the soap dispenser a fun and unique addition to any bathroom.

Soap Dispenser with Augmented Reality: Develop a soap dispenser that uses augmented reality (AR) technology to display fun and educational content on its screen. For example, the dispenser could display a virtual representation of the soap, showing how it's made and its benefits for hand hygiene. This would make hand-washing more engaging and informative.

Soap Dispenser with Music Integration: Design a soap dispenser that can play music while dispensing soap. Users can choose from a variety of songs or play their own music through Bluetooth connectivity. This would make hand-washing a more enjoyable and relaxing experience.
